channel.title: New RuneScape Trailer
channel.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TB88piitm9o I think it looks fucking amazing. What are your guys input on the video?

item.title: New RuneScape Trailer
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

See, those two trailers are better because they represent aspects of the game where as this new one is just a bunch of pictures. They still could have been more exciting, maybe a bit more building of tension and release with the music or something but still good.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

I was just pointing out the common thing where people want to see a movie based from a game, and it turns to shit.
It wouldn’t be the first, and it wouldn’t be the last.

Read full topic

item.title: New RuneScape Trailer
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:41, topic:499930”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=618157.msg4257269#msg4257269 date=1362970261]

I wanna see a Rs movie.

until you see and RS movie

What lol

you want to see an RS movie til you see it and it’s a loveing mess.
edit; lol saw a spelling error, meant “an” instead of “and”
[/quote]
I’m sure they are capable making a decent CG movie.



I agree with 3lv3n snip3r.
However, I did not mean that they would make the movie. I’d imagine they’d own the movie rights etcetc but the people who write the lore etc for this game are probably not suited to make a movie so I’m sure they would hire people to work with them to make the movie. I’m sure if Jagex made the movie with only the staff they currently possess it could be decent, not amazing but interesting.

Read full topic

item.title: New RuneScape Trailer
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

The only thing with the quest that doesn’t make sense, is that it doesn’t require While Guthix Sleeps to be done. Because, during WGS, you’re trying to find Guthix and if you already did TWW, you already know that Guthix is dead.

Weird… Isn’t WGS during the lore too?

item.description:

item.title: New RuneScape Trailer
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:26, topic:499930”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=618157.msg4246426#msg4246426 date=1362113432]

If you actually pay attention when doing quests, you will notice that they do put a decent amount of thought into the story lines. I believe that the players that do quest, like the big quests that give a ‘bang’ during it, at least I do. The latest quests like The Brink of Extinction, Ritual of the Mahjarrat, Rune Mysteries/Memories, and even While Guthix Sleeps all had nice story lines, you just had to pay attention during it.

I’d easily like to see all their quest lines, because I haven’t had the chance to do any of the grandmaster or any even hard quest.
[/quote]
If you do the Dragonkin/Guthix/Mahjarrat quest line, the suspense will build up with every quest you do if you read the dialogue.[/quote]
I should just watch video walk-throughs of them, haha.

Read full topic

If you do the Dragonkin/Guthix/Mahjarrat quest line, the suspense will build up with every quest you do if you read the dialogue.

wtf is this? Look’s and sounds nothing like the rs I know and love.

3lv3n snip3r:

If you actually pay attention when doing quests, you will notice that they do put a decent amount of thought into the story lines. I believe that the players that do quest, like the big quests that give a ‘bang’ during it, at least I do. The latest quests like The Brink of Extinction, Ritual of the Mahjarrat, Rune Mysteries/Memories, and even While Guthix Sleeps all had nice story lines, you just had to pay attention during it.

I’d easily like to see all their quest lines, because I haven’t had the chance to do any of the grandmaster or any even hard quest.
